Comment: This game involves me playing a horrible opening and a terrific endgame.  I have a habit of bizzare opening . But I like to experiment with new stuff. It sometimes throws off better players. Even playing white I am the underdog.
Went with a hyper modern opening- controling the center with less pawns.
Went with a hyper modern opening- controling the center with less pawns.

25. hxg5!! My best play of the game. Horse sacrifice to lead to mate in 9. I will be truthful and say that I didn't see the exact mate , but I knew opening the f-h files would lead to a mate, just not exactly how yet.
